gen:link.msg:message: `IntangibleAssets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
